saying: You're not living unless you're sweating!
description: Bud is a jock lion villager in the Animal Crossing series. He has appeared in all Animal Crossing series games except for the very first installment, Doubutsu no Mori. His Japanese name is a pun on the slang word gurasan, which is derived from sangurasu, meaning 'sunglasses'. In Animal Crossing and Doubutsu no Mori e+, he is an islander.
